'''Courtney''' is a friend of [[Tricia Hale]].

==History==
Courtney came to visit Tricia in her hospital room when she was injured in the bus crash. She wished her a quick recovery.

==Relationships==
===Friendships===
She, [[Tricia Hale]], [[Ariana]], and [[Molly (Forever Young)|Molly]] are friends.
